column4: Is there a program in Ubuntu that I scan analysis a Network and see usage and bottle necks ?
i understand what bottle necks are.. but how do you annalyze that?
snmp managment tools can do rrd graphs of cisco switches
yeah the snmp is what I would like to go to at one point
i would use a vmware image with it pre-setup tho.. you will have fun doing that on your own
just trying to narrow down what's going on right now with out going snmp
to setup.. not to use tho
: Any graphical analysis software that you know of ??
: Kinda like etherape but more detailed and options...
: Probley have to goto snmp for that too
not now.. i am trying to fix another problem... let me fix my 3d redering and i will help you
the only reason you would use snmp is if you switches and routers support it
most managable switches support it but cisco is the best for this
cacti is a great program for this
